## Essentials for data preparation and output (bold = must learn)

All these packages are available from [CRAN](https://cran.r-project.org/)

* `tidyverse` <http://tidyverse.org>  
    + **`dplyr`**  
    + **`ggplot2`**
* `stringr`   <http://stringr.tidyverse.org>
* **`rmarkdown`** 
* **`readr`**
* **`readxl`**
* `data.table`
* `janitor`
